item.text: Then the Lord spoke to Moses:

“<st data-num="06680" class="">Give</st> these <st data-num="06680" class="">instructions</st><n id="1" /> to the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st>, and <st data-num="0559 0413">tell</st> them: ‘<st data-num="03588" class="">When</st> <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> <st data-num="0935 0413">enter</st> <st data-num="0776 03667">Canaan</st>, the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> has been <st data-num="05307" class="">assigned</st> to you as an <st data-num="05159" class="">inheritance</st>,<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="03667" class="">Canaan</st> with its <st data-num="01367" class="">borders</st>,

your <st data-num="05045" class="">southern</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">border</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="01961" class="">extend</st> from the <st data-num="04057" class="">wilderness</st> of <st data-num="06790" class="">Zin</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">along</st> the <st data-num="0123" class="">Edomite</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">border</st>, and your <st data-num="05045" class="">southern</st> <st data-num="01366" class="">border</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">run</st> <st data-num="06924" class="">eastward</st> to the <st data-num="07097" class="">extremity</st> of the <st data-num="04417" class="">Salt</st> <st data-num="03220" class="">Sea</st>,<n id="2" />

and then the <st data-num="01366" class="">border</st> will <st data-num="05437" class="">turn</st> from the <st data-num="05045" class="">south</st> to the <st data-num="04610" class="">Scorpion Ascent</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="05674" class="">continue</st> to <st data-num="06790" class="">Zin</st>, and then its <st data-num="08444" class="">direction</st><n id="2" /> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> from the <st data-num="05045" class="">south</st> to <st data-num="06947" class="">Kadesh Barnea</st>. Then it will <st data-num="03318" class="">go</st> to <st data-num="02692" class="">Hazar Addar</st> and <st data-num="05674" class="">pass over</st> to <st data-num="06111" class="">Azmon</st>.
There the border will turn from Azmon to the Stream of Egypt, and then its direction is to the sea.
“‘And for a western border you will have the Great Sea. This will be your western border.
“‘And this will be your northern border: From the Great Sea you will draw a line to Mount Hor;

from <st data-num="02022" class="">Mount</st> <st data-num="02023" class="">Hor</st> you will <st data-num="08376" class="">draw a line</st> to <st data-num="0935" class="">Lebo</st> <st data-num="02574" class="">Hamath</st>,<n id="1" /> and the <st data-num="08444" class="">direction</st> of the <st data-num="01366" class="">border</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> to <st data-num="06657" class="">Zedad</st>.
The border will continue to Ziphron, and its direction will be to Hazar Enan. This will be your northern border.
“‘For your eastern border you will draw a line from Hazar Enan to Shepham.

The <st data-num="01366" class="">border</st> will <st data-num="03381" class="">run down</st> from <st data-num="08221" class="">Shepham</st> to <st data-num="07247" class="">Riblah</st>, on the <st data-num="06924" class="">east side</st> of <st data-num="05871" class="">Ain</st>, and the <st data-num="01366" class="">border</st> will <st data-num="03381" class="">descend</st> and <st data-num="04229 05921">reach</st> the <st data-num="06924" class="">eastern</st> <st data-num="03802" class="">side</st> of the <st data-num="03220" class="">Sea</st> of <st data-num="03672" class="">Kinnereth</st>.<n id="1" />
Then the border will continue down the Jordan River and its direction will be to the Salt Sea. This will be your land by its borders that surround it.’”
Then Moses commanded the Israelites: “This is the land that you will inherit by lot, which the Lord has commanded to be given to the nine-and-a-half tribes,

<st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of the <st data-num="01121 07206">Reubenites</st> by their <st data-num="01004 01">families</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of the <st data-num="01121 01410">Gadites</st> by their <st data-num="01004 01">families</st>, and the <st data-num="02677" class="">half</st>-<st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="04519" class="">Manasseh</st> have <st data-num="03947" class="">received</st> their <st data-num="05159" class="">inheritance</st>.
The two-and-a-half tribes have received their inheritance on this side of the Jordan, east of Jericho, toward the sunrise.”
The Lord said to Moses:

“<st data-num="0428" class="">These</st> are the <st data-num="08034" class="">names</st> of the <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> are to <st data-num="05157" class="">allocate</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> to you <st data-num="05157" class="">as an inheritance</st>:<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0499" class="">Eleazar</st> the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> and <st data-num="03091" class="">Joshua</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="05126" class="">Nun</st>.

You must <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="05387" class="">leader</st> from every<n id="1" /> <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> to assist in <st data-num="05157" class="">allocating</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="05157" class="">as an inheritance</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="0428" class="">These</st> are the <st data-num="08034" class="">names</st> of the <st data-num="0582" class="">men</st>: from the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st>, <st data-num="03612" class="">Caleb</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="03312" class="">Jephunneh</st>;

from the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of the <st data-num="01121 08095">Simeonites</st>, <st data-num="08050" class="">Shemuel</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="05989" class="">Ammihud</st>;

from the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="01144" class="">Benjamin</st>, <st data-num="0449" class="">Elidad</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="03692" class="">Kislon</st>;

and from the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of the <st data-num="01121 01835">Danites</st>, a <st data-num="05387" class="">leader</st>, <st data-num="01231" class="">Bukki</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="03020" class="">Jogli</st>.

From the <st data-num="01121 03130">Josephites</st>, <st data-num="02592" class="">Hanniel</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="0641" class="">Ephod</st>, a <st data-num="05387" class="">leader</st> from the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="01121 04519">Manasseh</st>;

from the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of the <st data-num="01121 0669">Ephraimites</st>, a <st data-num="05387" class="">leader</st>, <st data-num="07055" class="">Kemuel</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="08204" class="">Shiphtan</st>;

from the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of the <st data-num="01121 02074">Zebulunites</st>, a <st data-num="05387" class="">leader</st>, <st data-num="0469" class="">Elizaphan</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="06535" class="">Parnach</st>;

from the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of the <st data-num="01121 03485">Issacharites</st>, a <st data-num="05387" class="">leader</st>, <st data-num="06409" class="">Paltiel</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="05821" class="">Azzan</st>;

from the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of the <st data-num="01121 0836">Asherites</st>, a <st data-num="05387" class="">leader</st>, <st data-num="0282" class="">Ahihud</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="08015" class="">Shelomi</st>;

and from the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of the <st data-num="01121 05321">Naphtalites</st>, a <st data-num="05387" class="">leader</st>, <st data-num="06300" class="">Pedahel</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="05989" class="">Ammihud</st>.”
These are the ones whom the Lord commanded to divide up the inheritance among the Israelites in the land of Canaan.
